backend/main.mo: Actor manages presale state, tracks contributions and allocations, and exposes queries and updates with validation and cap enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence linking presale remaining-ICP formatting requirement to the PresaleProgress component with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend files, including presale UI components, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, color variables, and dark mode overrides with neon theme.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout combining presale sections, post-presale listings, animated background effects, and music controller.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusic/: Renders mute and volume controls in a popover when background music is playing.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright and caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic host identifier.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Aggregates and displays contributor data in a styled table with timestamps and loading states.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Displays a 24‑hour countdown timer using values from useCountdown24h.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Shows the presale deposit address with clipboard copy functionality and confirmation message.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Displays the presale hero section with an image, animated title, tagline, and three feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: Explains how to contribute to the presale with numbered steps and key presale details using constants.
frontend/src/components/presale/PostPres: Shows post‑presale listing info with loading, active‑presale, and finished‑presale states using presale status and constants.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Displays presale progress, including percent, stats, remaining ICP, and an ended badge based on presale status.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps countdown, presale parameters, progress bar, and deposit address into the main presale status section.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Presents tokenomics info and a FAQ section using preset constants like max supply.
frontend/src/constants/listingsAfterPres: Defines the ListingItem type and an array of planned post‑presale listings.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Exports presale constants including deposit address, cap, max supply, and polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: React hook managing background music playback, preferences, and autoplay handling with a persistent audio element.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Fetches contributor data via actor.getAllContributors with polling using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Provides a live countdown from 24 hours, updating hours, minutes, and seconds every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Fetches presale status via actor.getPresaleStatus with periodic polling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom neon color variables and various animation utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backgroundMusicStorag: Handles saving and loading music preferences and opt-in state from localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates raw contribution records by address, summing amounts and sorting by latest timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats numbers with German-style dot thousand separators for ICP values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and theme settings including neon color variables.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for the IcpMemeDoge presale site, including goals, architectural notes, known issues, and implemented features. Acts as a planning and tracking record for build, integration, and UI requirements.
